main event: A witness observed a round, dull yellow object in the sky for about 10-15 seconds.
interesting points: The object appeared to be the size of a dull yellow balloon and the witness did not see it take off or land.
The witness was located outdoors and estimated the object was about 200 feet away.
The witness reported the object made a slight swishing sound.
The witness estimated the angular size of the object would have covered about 1/3 of a match stick held at arm's length.
The witness had seen a similar object before and reported the sighting to the Air Force.
